content: The word of the LORD that came to the prophet Jeremiah concerning the Philistines, before Pharaoh attacked Gaza:
See, waters are rising out of the north
they shall overflow the land and all that fills it,
At the noise of the stamping of the hoofs of his stallions,
parents do not turn back for children,
because of the day that is coming
to cut off from Tyre and Sidon
For the  is destroying the Philistines,
Against Ashkelon and against the seashoreâ€”
